name: Electric Lawn Care Equipment Rebate
description: Up to $150 for city residents, $300 for city-based businesses when turning in gas-powered equipment for electric versions (leaf blower, string trimmer, hedge trimmer, edger, cultivator/tiller)
fullDescription: The City of Redwood City offers rebates for switching from gas-powered lawn equipment to electric, reducing noise and air pollution in the community.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $150 rebate for residents
- Up to $300 rebate for businesses
- Covers leaf blowers
- Covers string trimmers
- Covers hedge trimmers, edgers, tillers
- Must trade in gas-powered equipment
howToGetIt:
1. Must be Redwood City resident or business
2. Purchase qualifying electric lawn equipment
3. Turn in old gas-powered equipment at designated location
4. Apply through City of Redwood City website
5. Submit proof of purchase and trade-in
6. Receive rebate check
keywords: Redwood City, lawn equipment, leaf blower, string trimmer, hedge trimmer, edger, electric, gas trade-in, $150, $300
